section.heading: Schedule of Fees.
section.text: Pursuant to Business Occupations and Professions Article, Title 16, Annotated Code of Maryland, the Commission shall set fees to produce funds to approximate the cost of maintaining the Commission. Fees charged by the Commission are as follows:

para.text: Appraisal management company application review fee (nonrefundable) — $250;
Original appraisal management company registration fee — $1,750; and
Annual appraisal management company registration fee — $2,000.

annotations.annotation: Business Occupations and Professions Article, §§16-217, 16-5B-04, and 16-5B-18, Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 adopted as an emergency provision effective February 24, 2012 (39:6 Md. R. 406); adopted permanently effective May 28, 2012 (39:10 Md. R. 659)
Regulation .01B, C amended effective February 1, 2016 (42:26 Md. R. 1594)
